note.p: Gardener. Born in Wavertree, West Derby, Lancashire. Employed by Thomas de Grey, sixth baron Walsingham, at Merton Hall, Thetford, Norfolk. Conditionally offered employment by CD in September 1879. Family moved to Ireland and then Chelsea. Settled in Lillingstone Lovell, Buckinghamshire, by 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales 1891 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG12/1154/65/17)
letter to Thomas de Grey, 26 September 1879
